extended_signature.instructions: You are a sentiment analysis expert. Given the text input, analyze the content to extract specific aspects related to user experiences with electronic devices, particularly focusing on their sentiments. Produce the fields `aspects`, detailing the identified terms and their associated polarities (positive, negative, etc.).
